alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 16 at 7:27PM CDT until June 17 at 7:55AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Moderate out of bank flooding will occur. A few rural roads closures will be needed along the river reach. Moderate flooding will occur along the river through Greenville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 4.9 feet Wednesday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
